TopicTitle: In 0.90 carrier mode, evey building is maxed out at the start. How to fix it?

Articles.Content: For some reason every building is max level when i start the game in Carrier mode.. i tried all difficulty settings, and the other game modes, but nothing has changed. I couldnt find a settings option for this, so i guess its a bug. Any ideas how can i fix it?
This is a known bug with the windows 64 bit version. There is no known workaround.
SOMETIMES, transferring your save to a 32 bit version will allow you to see the buildings in their proper state and upgrade. I say sometimes because it has been hit and miss with a lot of people.
Thank u for the answers. I think it will be fine with 32 bit too, for the beginning at least, and later i can transfer the saves to the 64 bit version if i need more ram.
